definitions.text: a person whose case has been referred to a specialist or professional group
examples: the patient is a referral from Dr. Bones

definitions.text: a recommendation to consult the (professional) person or group to whom one has been referred
examples: the insurance company says that you need a written referral from your physician before seeing a specialist

definitions.text: the act of referring (as forwarding an applicant for employment or referring a matter to an appropriate agency)
